asypad.shapes

Class Line

  • java.lang.Object
    • asypad.shapes.Shape
      • asypad.shapes.Line

  • public class Line
extends Shape
    Custom Line used for drawing in AsyPad.
    Author:
    Raymond Feng

        p2 - second point
        isSegment - if this line is a segment

      • Line

        public Line(Point p,
            Line l,
            boolean isParallel)
        Constructs line through specified point that is parallel or perpendicular to specified line.
        Parameters:
        p - point that line should go through
        l - line that will be used as reference
        isParallel - true for a parallel line, false for a perpendicular line
